config_part.ioc_details: IOC to control the Newport XPS-D and connected axes

macro.name: MTRCTRL
macro.description: Controller number used in motor address assignment

macro.name: AXIS1_ID
macro.description: The ID of the axis as set in the controller, looks like Group1.Axis1. Leave blank for no axis (default: )

macro.name: AXIS2_ID
macro.description: The ID of the axis as set in the controller, looks like Group1.Axis1. Leave blank for no axis (default: )

macro.name: AXIS3_ID
macro.description: The ID of the axis as set in the controller, looks like Group1.Axis1. Leave blank for no axis (default: )

macro.name: AXIS4_ID
macro.description: The ID of the axis as set in the controller, looks like Group1.Axis1. Leave blank for no axis (default: )
